author: Anuradha
text: The whole of me wants to be with the whole of you....Because  I love you 😘😘😘😘☺️😊❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ Love you so so much 💚💚☀️

author: Anuradha
text:
And finally I have given up.
I now acknowledge it's existence in my Garden of Heart and cherish it as the most important and beautiful plant. 
My Love for you, my dearest one, is that WILDFLOWER.
      -From a Wild Lover,
With lots and lots of Love 💚♥️💚♥️

author: Anuradha
text: I again tried to dig deeper and uproot it completely this time but I found that it had developed roots earlier and shoots later. What I saw above the earth was far less than what was below. It became visible on the surface much later although it existed underground years ago..

author: Anuradha
text: For me, Strength is Beautiful and damn attractive. I cannot admire beauty that is weak and fragile. I had to admire that flower & respect it's desire to live and the life force flowing through it. ♥️♥️

author: Anuradha
text: And then one day it bore a flower...a Wildflower... It wasn't beautiful like Rose, but it wasn't less either.. it was one of its kind. I call it beautiful because it has survived everything, has faced every difficulty and emerged out stronger than before...

author: Anuradha
text:
My Love wasn't planted, it grew out of nowhere. I didn't water it but instead it starved, forget about nourishment. I never gave it time and overlooked it. I did everything I could to stop it from growing and tried to destroy it initially but couldn't succeed.... 
@PoemHeaven

author: Anuradha
text:
🥀🌹
My Love is not a Red Rose. We 'plant' it, graft it, take care of it, manure it, nourish it, water it, give our time and energy and then it bears a flower...

author: Anuradha
text:
Hiding your hate from someone you hate is easy but hiding your love from someone U love is impossible.. 
Confession becomes mandatory even when you know everything beforehand.. because pretention is hardest. I didn’t confess to hear same from U
I just wanted to make sure you knew

author: Anuradha
text:
The way my eyes see U haven't seen anyone else. I wish I could lend U my vision and let U know how deeply I feel for you.
I choose you because I am sure of you and my feelings for you. Maybe I chose you years ago but was unaware & now will keep choosing you over and over again ❤️
